languages.text: "Да, Лорд-капитан, крайне прискорбная". {n}На лице Мастера дисциплины мелькает хищная улыбка.{/n}
"Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да, Лорд-капитан, крайне прискорбная". {n}На лице Мастера дисциплины мелькает хищная улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

"Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

languages.text: “确实如此，舰长大人。这实在是太遗憾了。”{n}戒律大师回答道，脸上掠过一丝嗜血的假笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，舰长大人。这实在是太遗憾了。”{n}戒律大师回答道，脸上掠过一丝嗜血的假笑。{/n}

languages.text: «Lo es, Lord Capitán, mal que nos pese», {n}dice la maestra de armas esbozando una sonrisa cruel de oreja a oreja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo es, Lord Capitán, mal que nos pese», {n}dice la maestra de armas esbozando una sonrisa cruel de oreja a oreja.{/n}

languages.text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。とても不幸な事に」{n}と、マスター・アット・アームが血に飢えた笑みを浮かべて言う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。とても不幸な事に」{n}と、マスター・アット・アームが血に飢えた笑みを浮かべて言う。{/n}

languages.text: "In der Tat, Lord Captain, sehr unerfreulich", {n}entgegnet die Waffenmeisterin mit einem blutrünstigen Grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, Lord Captain, sehr unerfreulich", {n}entgegnet die Waffenmeisterin mit einem blutrünstigen Grinsen.{/n}

languages.text: « Comme vous dites, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est fort regrettable, » {n}fait la capitaine d'armes alors qu'un rictus sanguinaire se dessine sur son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, tüm yüzüne yayılan kana susamış bir sırıtışla konuşuyor.{/n} "Gerçekten de çok üzücü Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Lord Captain, most unfortunate," {n}says the Master-at-Arms, a bloodthirsty smirk stealing across her face.{/n}
